Topic.Title: Having trouble running the game in QDK

Posts.EditableText:
It has worked before, but now when I try to run the game that I am working on, instead of starting the game, it starts up the QDK again.

I have tried the icon, File|Run etc. Anybody have any ideas as to how to fix this? 

Mezmriz
Posts.HTML:
It has worked before, but now when I try to run the game that I am working on, instead of starting the game, it starts up the QDK again.

I have tried the icon, File|Run etc. Anybody have any ideas as to how to fix this?

Mezmriz

Posts.EditableText: Try right clicking on the file, select "open with" and then click Quest.
Posts.HTML: Try right clicking on the file, select "open with" and then click Quest.

Posts.EditableText:
If you want a slightly more permenant fix than that, from windows explorer:

Tools => Folder Options
Under the File Types tab, choose the file extension from the list, and change the default program to Quest.

The registry is easier, though.
Posts.HTML:
If you want a slightly more permenant fix than that, from windows explorer:

Tools => Folder Options
Under the File Types tab, choose the file extension from the list, and change the default program to Quest.

The registry is easier, though.

Posts.EditableText:
Actually, the easiest way is to shift and right click, select "open with.." then type in the programs name and location in - possibly after clicking 'other'.
Then you tick the little box that says "allways use this to open these file types".
Posts.HTML:
